quest.name: Missing Alchemist
journal:
 Quest Sync
The honest alchemist needs help.
objectives: Speak with the honest alchemist again.
Retrieve the goods from the water.

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: You've come by at the perfect time, adventurer! Could you help me find someone? One of my colleagues went to receive a delivery and hasn't come back. I'm worried something might have happened...

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you. He went to Yedlihmad, so let's start by looking around the aetheryte there.

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: I've been asking around about my colleague, and someone claims to have seen him setting out from port in a small boat.

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: Maybe he loaded the shipment onto it and headed back. In which case, we must have just missed him. I hope that's all that happened...

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: Well, let's head back to the Great Work. We should keep an eye on the shoreline on our way back just in case.

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: Oh no! His boat must have capsized!

dialogue.name: COLLEAGUEALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: I... I loaded...everything...on the boat to bring back... But something hit us, and...

dialogue.name: COLLEAGUEALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: I managed to swim to safety, but the cargo... I'm so sorry...

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: Forget the cargo! All that matters is you're all right. We'll just have to do without the sunken goods.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Shall I retrieve them for you?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Looks like the perfect opportunity to practice my underwater breathing technique.

dialogue.name: COLLEAGUEALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: Thank you... There were five articles in all... Some of them sunk...but some float.

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: I'm sorry to leave all of this to you, but I need to get him home before his condition worsens. We'll head back to the Great Work first, so come meet us when you're done.

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: You made it back! If you're worried about my colleague, he's fine. Just resting after clearing out the water in his lungs. I gave him some chai and he went right to sleep.

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: You managed to retrieve all the lost cargo? Incredible! These are valuable weapons imported from Vylbrand. They just need a few alchemic finishing touches before they're complete.

dialogue.name: HONESTALCHEMIST
dialogue.text: From here, they'll head off to the hands of the Radz–at–Han warriors to help protect the order. Thank you for everything, adventurer.
